1c7042bf-047b-4dea-a63b-32a211c4475b.description: The Certified Third Party Risk Professional (CTPRP) designation from Shared Assessments is a professional certification credential designed to validate knowledge, experience, and proficiency in the development and operations of a comprehensive Third Party Risk Management (TPRM) Program; including the analysis, management, and remediation of Third Party risk issues.
1c7042bf-047b-4dea-a63b-32a211c4475b.name: Shared Assessments CTPRP Badge

alignments.name: Maintaining certification
alignments.description: To retain the CTPRP certification, holders must comply with the following requirements: Earn 60 CPE credits per three-year certification term, remain current with annual maintenance fee payments and renewal fees and abide by the Shared Assessments Code of Ethics.

badge_template_activities.title: CTPRP certification holders attended a CTPRP training course, successfully passed the examination and submitted an application detailing a minimum of five years experience as a Third Party Risk Management professional.

d17acc8f-c983-4963-a33d-c2462f022c41.description: The Certified Third Party Risk Assessor (CTPRA) designation from Shared Assessments is a professional certification credential that validates knowledge, expertise, and proficiency in a controls evaluation within specific Third Party risk control domains needed to perform a comprehensive IT risk evaluation of a third party during an assessment.
d17acc8f-c983-4963-a33d-c2462f022c41.name: Shared Assessments CTPRA Badge

alignments.name: Maintaining certification
alignments.description: To retain the CTPRA certification, holders must comply with the following requirements: Earn 60 CPE credits per three-year certification term, remain current with annual maintenance fee payments and renewal fees and abide by the Shared Assessments Code of Ethics.

badge_template_activities.title: CTPRA certification holders attended a CTPRA training course, successfully passed the examination and submitted an application detailing a minimum of five years experience as an IT risk management professional.

10436f07-9a88-4f85-b63e-5157d143a665.description: The SIG Fundamentals training examines the organizational structure of the SIG, key differences between a SIG Core and Lite, and provides step-by-step instructions on how to create a truly custom questionnaire to fit the needs of your vendor assessments.
10436f07-9a88-4f85-b63e-5157d143a665.name: Shared Assessments SIG Fundamentals Badge

alignments.name: Certificate of Completion
alignments.description: The SIG Fundamentals training has no maintenance, renewal, or ongoing CPE requirements

badge_template_activities.title: SIG Fundamentals certificate holders must complete the training course and practice scenarios.

166338bc-c483-4750-a49f-243ad1ce5964.description: The SCA Guidelines are intended for use by any third party risk assessor that utilizes the Shared Assessments Standardized Control Assessment (SCA) Procedures Tool licensed by the client. The SCA Guidelines are provided in addition to other Shared Assessments materials and resources that are developed, released, licensed and distributed for standardized use in execution of third party risk assessments.
166338bc-c483-4750-a49f-243ad1ce5964.name: Shared Assessments SCA Badge

alignments.name: SCA Guidelines
alignments.description: The SCA Guidelines are intended for use by organizations and third party risk practitioners to ensure consistency related to the execution and reporting of results from third party risk assessments that utilize the Standardized Control Assessment (SCA) Procedures Tool.

badge_template_activities.title: This badge verifies a signed commitment to follow the Shared Assessments SCA Guidelines. All badge holders must be a Shared Assessments member in good standing to continue to display a badge.

50815579-cf31-4c68-bf09-4327c3104402.name: Shared Assessments Associate CTPRP Badge

34af6d2d-2603-42bf-a9a2-58f91de9a943.description: Shared Assessments Content Licensee partner has validated the latest 2022 SIG content is incorporated into their product solution for client use.
34af6d2d-2603-42bf-a9a2-58f91de9a943.name: Shared Assessments SIG Badge
